diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Bacteremic pneumonia due to multidrug-resistant Streptococcus pneumoniae
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Three patients presented with bacteremic community-acquired lower respiratory tract infection resistant to azithromycin. Confirmation was achieved through culture results showing S. pneumoniae isolates, which were all nonsusceptible to at least two different antibacterial classes, leading to successful treatment with levofloxacin.
